item.title: My First Post
item.description: The title here could be a bit of a misnomer due to the inherent ambiguity of language and inherent vagueness of human thought, so letâ€™s first clear out what do I mean with it. Quantum, I use here to denote the smallest independent unit of a substance/construct which is further indivisible into functional units. So what I will be talking about is what is the smallest unit inside of us or even external to us that can be considered the basic unit of self.
